links.name: Polygon Bridge
links.description: A two-way bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Polygon.

links.name: Optimism Gateway
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Optimism.

links.name: xDAI Bridge
links.description: A two-way bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and xDAI.

links.name: Binance Smart Chain Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain.

links.name: Arbitrum Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Arbitrum.

links.name: Celo Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Celo.

links.name: Harmony Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Harmony.

links.name: Fusion DCRM Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and Fusion.

links.name: xDai Omnitoken Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and the xDai Omnitoken.

links.name: Connext Vector Bridge
links.description: A bridge that allows users to transfer assets between Ethereum and other layer 2 solutions.
